description: This file defines API endpoints related to user subscriptions, including creating/updating subscriptions, listing user subscriptions, creating Stripe checkout sessions, and processing Stripe webhooks. It uses FastAPI's routing system, interacts with a database via SQLAlchemy asynchronously, and integrates with Stripe via a service class.

classes.name: StripeService
classes.description: A service class to handle Stripe-related operations such as creating checkout sessions and verifying webhooks.

methods.name: create_or_update_subscription( payload: SubscriptionCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Creates or updates a user subscription, interfacing with the database.

methods.name: list_subscriptions(db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Retrieves all subscriptions for the current user.

methods.name: create_checkout_session( plan: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Creates a Stripe checkout session for the selected plan and returns the session info.

methods.name: stripe_webhook(request: Request, stripe_signature: Optional[str] = Header(default=None, alias="Stripe-Signature"))
methods.description: Handles incoming Stripe webhook events and verifies their authenticity.

ctags.name: create_checkout_session
ctags.signature: ( plan: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: create_or_update_subscription
ctags.signature: ( payload: SubscriptionCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: list_subscriptions
ctags.pattern: /^async def list_subscriptions(db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_curren/

ctags.name: stripe_webhook
ctags.pattern: /^async def stripe_webhook(request: Request, stripe_signature: Optional[str] = Header(default=None/
